SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.session

Class Session

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.session.Session
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
XclientSession
public class Session extends Object implements Serializable, Cloneable
Session.

This is the primary container for session data.

See Also:

    • clone

      public Session clone()
      Creates a copy of this Session.

      Uses Object.clone() for a field-by-field copy, then deep-copies mutable arrays and non-final collections that would otherwise be shared. Final collections and objects without a clone implementation are left as-is.

      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      A cloned Session instance.

    • close
